name: Cat Space Clash
description:
A space cat-traveler who crashed in the depths of a galaxy on an unusual planet. Interacting with the local population. Use different types of weapons and abilities. Defeat aggressive inhabitants unfamiliar planet, among whom there are big and dangerous bosses with unique combat mechanics. Only by showing dexterity in battle, you will be able to return home.

Features: - Revives the style and spirit of the best classic platformers of the 90s, bringing a modern and exciting game mechanics!

- Contrast your fighting spirit with huge bosses with unique mechanics!

- Improve your abilities, find new equipment and carry your enemies!

- Secret zones, different types of weapons, tasks and crowds of enemies will not let you get bored!

- Control of the old games of the 90's. Everything is at hand!
